name: Prof. (Dr.) N. D. Mathur
summary: Prof. N.D. Mathur is an eminent academician with nearly five decades of teaching, research and leadership in Economics, Commerce and Management. He has authored textbooks and reference books, supervised numerous PhD scholars, published extensively, and served in senior administrative and advisory roles across universities and national committees and bodies. He has USP of being professor in 3 disciplines independently viz Management, Commerce and Economics.
